fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Maul a player each night, attacking them and all their visitors with a __Powerful__ attack.
- If you are visited, your visitors will be silently poisoned with a 2 day delayed __Unstoppable__ attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You will role-block all players that threaten to expose you. (Investigation Roles)
You may win with the **Striker** if you both spawn.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who threaten your business. (standard nk wincon with flavor)
